title: Which state has the most electoral votes? - Quora
tags: Electoral College of the United States of America

response.answer_text: California 55Texas 38Florida 29New York 29Illinois 20Pennsylvania 20Ohio 18Michigan 16Georgia 16North Carolina 15New Jersey 14Washington 12Arizona 11Tennessee 11Indiana 11Massachusetts 11( Photo Credits : From Google For Better Understanding )

There are two ways of looking at this. Obviously, the most electoral votes go to the states with the biggest population. California, New York, Florida, Texas. But which state gets the most Electoral College power per vote? That would be Wyoming, whose voters get 3 times the weight of New York voters in the Electoral College. Also high up on the Small State Tyranny list: Vermont, Alaska, Hawaii, and North Dakota, whose voters get 2 to 2.5 times the power of Californians. It makes you wonder about democracy.
